review_title: Excellent Working Environment - Only Giving 4 Stars Because Everyone Has Room for Improvement
job_title: Marketing (PR, Social Media, Advertising) in Lancaster, PA
pros: There are many employees who have been at LBC | Capital for 10+, 20+, and even 30+ years. That kind of retention rate speaks highly to an organization that truly cares for it's employees. Many employees also have access to reduced tuition for themselves, their spouses and dependents. In my position, I have rarely felt a pressure from my direct supervisor to work outside of my 9-5 hours - a rarity for this field!  Also, since this is a college, you still get snows days an adult which is AMAZING.
cons: With my experience in marketing, I know I could be getting better compensation elsewhere. But this is a non-profit as well as a business, so keep that in mind. The other benefits make up for the pay gap. I'm also a disappointed that there are not more women in leadership and management roles here - but that is slowly changing.
